summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4459 for the improvement of the alley in Block 1, Queen Anne 2nd Addition, being the alley between 10th Avenue West and 11th Avenue West, from West Crockett Street to West McGraw Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52573, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
